def_en: Your capacity for something is your ability to do it, or the amount of it that you are able to do.

def_cn: (工厂、企业、地区的)生产量,生产（或运输）能力
def_en: The capacity of something such as a factory, industry, or region is the quantity of things that it can produce or deliver with the equipment or resources that are available.
The capacity of a piece of equipment is its size or power, often measured in particular units.
The capacity of a container is its volume, or the amount of liquid it can hold, measured in units such as litres or gallons.

def_cn: (建筑、地方、车辆的)可容纳人数,载客量
def_en: The capacity of a building, place, or vehicle is the number of people or things that it can hold. If a place is filled to capacity, it is as full as it can possibly be.

def_cn: 座无虚席的;满场的;挤满的
def_en: A capacity crowd or audience completely fills a theatre, sports stadium, or other place.
If you do something in a particular capacity, you do it as part of a particular job or duty, or because you are representing a particular organization or person.
